articles.description: The boy, who loves playing hide-and-seek at his coach Rameshs Chess Gurukul when he comes ahead of time, is opposite on the board. He is patient to the extent he sometimes takes 20-30 minutes or even more on a single move.
articles.content: Rameshbabu Praggnanandhaa can throw up a bit of a challenge when spelling his name. But we better get used to it. Just like we did in the case of Pilavullakandi Thekkeparambil. For, those were the fi… [+5576 chars]
